response.overview: Set against the contrasting backdrop of Hawaii’s natural beauty and the stark realities of homelessness, An Island of the Mind is a deeply human story about resilience, recovery, and the power of empathy. The film challenges viewers to reconsider their perceptions of mental illness and homelessness, showing that even in the most difficult circumstances, there is hope, connection, and the possibility for change. This vérité style documentary film follows the only psychiatrist in Hawaii who has made it his mission to serve the mentally ill homeless population. The film follows the transformation of people with schizophrenia as they receive treatment for the first time.
response.title: An Island of the Mind
